name: unifi-voucher-site
tagline: A simple interface for generating UniFi hotspot vouchers
description: unifi-voucher-site is a simple self-hosted website for generating UniFi hotspot vouchers. It connects to the UniFi controller and exposes a user-friendly form for voucher creation.

features.title: Voucher Generation
features.description: Create UniFi hotspot vouchers with custom duration and bandwidth limits

features.title: Unifi Integration
features.description: Connect directly to UniFi controller to generate vouchers programmatically

features.title: User
features.description: Provide a simple web form for non-technical users to create vouchers

features.title: Custom Durations
features.description: Set voucher validity periods from minutes to days based on your needs

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Define upload and download speed limits for voucher users

features.title: Batch Creation
features.description: Generate multiple vouchers at once for events or bulk distribution

features.title: Voucher Display
features.description: Show generated voucher codes clearly for easy distribution to guests

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Restrict who can generate vouchers with authentication and permissions
